bibl.title: 'He That Dwelleth in the Help of the Highest': Septuagint Psalm 90 and the Iconographic Program on Byzantine Armbands.

series.title: Studies in Scripture in Early Judaism and Christianity.

bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. The socio-cultural context: Objects with Greek (Septuagint) Psalm 90. - 3. A closer look at the armbands with focus on one newly edited in the British Museum [ed.: Idem, Fragmente eines Amulett-Armbands im British Museum (London) mit Septuaginta-Psalm 90 und der Huldigung der Magier, JAC 48-49 (2005-2006 [2008]) pp. 114-127 et pll. 2-3]. - 4. Scripture as artifact - artifact as scripture?

bibl.title: Jewish and Christian Scripture as Artifact and Canon

bibl.seg: Kraus Thomas J., 'He That Dwelleth in the Help of the Highest': Septuagint Psalm 90 and the Iconographic Program on Byzantine Armbands.

Craig A. Evans and H. Daniel Zacharias (Edd.), Jewish and Christian Scripture as Artifact and Canon = Studies in Scripture in Early Judaism and Christianity. 13 = Library of Second Temple Studies. 70 (London, 2009) pp. 137-147.

1. Introduction. - 2. The socio-cultural context: Objects with Greek (Septuagint) Psalm 90. - 3. A closer look at the armbands with focus on one newly edited in the British Museum [ed.: Idem, Fragmente eines Amulett-Armbands im British Museum (London) mit Septuaginta-Psalm 90 und der Huldigung der Magier, JAC 48-49 (2005-2006 [2008]) pp. 114-127 et pll. 2-3]. - 4. Scripture as artifact - artifact as scripture?
